quote: A timid person is frightened before a danger, a coward during the time, and a courageous person afterwards.
A Victory without danger is a triumph without glory.
A coward turns away, but a brave man's choice is danger.
A nation is not in danger of financial disaster merely because it owes itself money.
A person's fears are lighter when the danger is at hand.
A school without football is in danger of deteriorating into a medieval study hall.
A true knight is fuller of bravery in the midst, than in the beginning of danger.
As soon as there is life there is danger.
As soon as there is life there is danger.
As the ostrich when pursued hideth his head, but forgetteth his body; so the fears of a coward expose him to danger.
Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. The fearful are caught as often as the bold.

A Victory without danger is a triumph without glory.

As the ostrich when pursued hideth his head, but forgetteth his body; so the fears of a coward expose him to danger.
Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. The fearful are caught as often as the bold.
By increasing the size of the keyhole, today's playwrights are in danger of doing away with the door.
Courage - a perfect sensibility of the measure of danger, and a mental willingness to endure it.
Courage consists not in blindly overlooking danger, but in seeing it, and conquering it.
Courage in danger is half the battle.
Cowards falter, but danger is often overcome by those who nobly dare.
Danger breeds best on too much confidence.
Danger, the spur of all great minds.
Delay always breeds danger and to protract a great design is often to ruin it.
Delay always breeds danger; and to protract a great design is often to ruin it.
During the first period of a man's life, the danger is not to take the risk.
He is most free from danger, who, even when safe, is on his guard.
How many of our daydreams would darken into nightmares, were there a danger of their coming true!
I find we are growing serious, and then we are in great danger of being dull.
If a little knowledge is dangerous, where is the man who has so much as to be out of danger?
If we must fall, we should boldly meet the danger.
If we survive danger it steels our courage more than anything else.
In comradeship is danger countered best.
In this world there is always danger for those who are afraid of it.
It is easy to be brave when far away from danger.
Let the fear of a danger be a spur to prevent it; he that fears not, gives advantage to the danger.
No one that encounters prosperity does not also encounter danger.
One is not exposed to danger who, even when in safety is always on their guard.
Out of this nettle, danger, we pluck this flower, safety.
People that are orthodox when they are young are in danger of being middle-aged all their lives.
Security will produce danger.
Send danger from the east unto the west, so honor cross it from the north to south.
She feared no danger, for she knew no sin.
Take away the danger and remove the restraint, and wayward nature runs free.
That so few now dare to be eccentric, marks the chief danger of the time.
That so few now dare to be eccentric, marks the chief danger of the time.
The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.
The crafty person is always in danger; and when they think they walk in the dark, all their pretenses are transparent.
The danger is not that a particular class is unfit to govern. Every class is unfit to govern.
The danger of the Web is that you can go from idea to public announcement in under ten minutes.
The humble are in danger when those in power disagree.
The man loves danger and sport. That is why he loves woman, the most dangerous of all sports.
The mere apprehension of a coming evil has put many into a situation of the utmost danger.
The ordinary man with extraordinary power is the chief danger for mankind - not the fiend or the sadist.
The path is smooth that leadeth on to danger.
The person who runs away exposes himself to that very danger more than a person who sits quietly.
The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like men, but that men will begin to think like computers.
The timid are afraid before the danger, the cowardly while in danger, and the courageous after danger.
The true danger is when liberty is nibbled away, for expedience, and by parts.
The true man wants two things: danger and play. For that reason he wants woman, as the most dangerous plaything.
The wise man in the storm prays to God, not for safety from danger, but for deliverance from fear.
There are few people so stubborn in their atheism who when danger is pressing in will not acknowledge the divine power.
There is a danger in being persuaded before one understands.
There is a danger of changing too much in the search for perfection.
There's nothing so comfortable as a small bankroll. A big one is always in danger.
Thou art blind to the danger of marrying a woman who feels and acts out the principle of equal rights.
Thus each extreme to equal danger tends, Plenty, as well as Want, can separate friends.
Thus fear of danger is ten thousand times more terrifying than danger itself.
To conquer without danger is to conquer without glory.
We are getting into semantics again. If we use words, there is a very grave danger they will be misinterpreted.
We are in danger of making our cities places where business goes on but where life, in its real sense, is lost.
We can never be certain of our courage until we have faced danger.
We do not quite forgive a giver. The hand that feeds us is in some danger of being bitten.
We prefer self-government with danger to servitude in tranquility.
We triumph without glory when we conquer without danger.
When peace has been broken anywhere, the peace of all countries everywhere is in danger.
You have to accept the fact that part of the sizzle of sex comes from the danger of sex. You can be overpowered.
